qas.question: What is the capital of Massachusetts?
As the state capital, Boston plays a large role in what?
What is the name of the massachusetts port authority?

context: In addition to city government, numerous commissions and state authorities—including the Massachusetts Department of Conservation and Recreation, the <a0_0>Boston<a0_0/> Public Health Commission, the <a2_0>Massachusetts Water Resources Authority<a2_0/> (MWRA), and the Massachusetts Port Authority (<a3_0>Massport<a3_0/>)—play a role in the life of Bostonians. As the capital of Massachusetts, Boston plays a major role in <a1_0>state politics<a1_0/>.
